sourcesContent:
import styles from './Totals.module.css' const Totals = (props) => { const person = props.person const handleEliminateTax = () => { props.eliminateTax() } return (
  • Subtotal ${person.subtotal}
  • Tax (8.875%)
    ${person.tax}
  • Tip ${person.tip}
  • Total ${person.total}
) } export default Totals
